resources.string: To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
Do not reduce media playback volume when a notification arrives
Draw right to switch next song
Draw left to switch previous song
Restore the charging settings on boot
This enables a notification with quick access to FastCharge Settings
Control processor and I/O scheduler settings

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
Change CPU governor and clock speed
Restore the processor settings on boot
Restore the I/O scheduler settings on boot
NOTE: The phone must stay still on a horizontal plane during calibration.
Band Class 11 (400 MHz European PAMR Band
Band Class 13 (2.5 GHz IMT-2000 Extension Band)
Allow theme apps from unknown sources
Trigger activation only on pending notifications
Force showing time when there is no notification
Modify look and behaviour of status bar
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
The amount of friction applied to scrolls and flings
The maximum velocity to start a fling
Long press power for torch torch
Long pressing power button with screen off toggles torch on/off
Modify look and behaviour of navigation bar

To get started tap the edit icon to unlock the navigation bar for editing.

You can tap an icon to change its shortcut, or long press an icon to re-arrange the layout.

Tap save to commit your changes, or restore to reset the layout to default settings.
Delete current settings and restore the default layout?
Show left and right arrow key while typing
Move navigation bar if device is rotated
When activated and device rotated, navigation bar gets moved to the side of the screen
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Navigation bar height while in portrait
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side
Use primary color of foreground app for Navigationbar background.
Use below color for navigationbar background
Use below color as fallback for navigationbar if dynamic navigationbar color is too similar to the buttons color
Options to dim navigation bar after inactivity
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Listen for touches on entire screen
Touching anywhere on the screen will cause buttons to un-dim
Only touches on the navbar will cause buttons to un-dim
Slide home button to the left/right to perform actions
Action to perform when sliding home to the left
Action to perform when sliding home to the right
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Settings for scheduled power on / off
Your device will shut down in %s seconds
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Maximum entries size has been reached
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Back\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Customize Pie targets, sytle, size and color
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off pie controls can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable navigation bar instead?
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Can\'t disable second layer! There\'s no other \'back button\' available.
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Weather widget, and weather provider settings
Select where the weather temperature is shown on the statusbar
Disables quick settings on secure lock screen
For better visibility on bright images
Long press on any image to use for static mode
Enable or disable several lockscreen items
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Display real time charger current, voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Use slim recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for slim recents
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Are you sure you want to reset Slim Recent to stock color?
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Automatically unlock as soon as the correct PIN has been entered (pressing OK not required)\nNote: will only work if below number of digits is set correctly!
Amount of digits of the PIN
For Quick unlock to work, please set the PIN length (amount of digits).
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Button options, where you can set actions and more
Quick Gestures to control your phone
Show battery status for the currently connected bluetooth device, if available.
One Hand Mode in the NavigationBar
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Options to customize the carrier label
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Specify the frequency range of operation
There was a problem setting the frequency band.
